snippet.title: adding spice to my indie game while fighting SAD... ( MetroRunner devlog #2)
snippet.description:
this video is an update on the amount of progress I a novice game developer made in 2 months using the godot game engine , my work on metro runner is severely impacted by my fight with the effects winter has on me, since the first devlog ive polished the game up a significant amout. indie game development isnt always easy but i try my best

#devlog #indiegame #indiegamedev #gamedev
